data.comment: The match is underway in Cardiff.
Jamal Lowe scores to make it 0-1 at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 6, That's a fine assist from Connor Roberts.
Ryan Bennett for Swansea has been booked by John Brooks and receives a first yellow card.
At Cardiff City Stadium, Sean Morrison has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 35, Swansea's Marc Guehi has been booked in Cardiff.
Kieffer Moore (Cardiff) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Joe Ralls is booked for the home team.
Robert Glatzel (Cardiff) has replaced the possibly injured Kieffer Moore.
In the minute 67, Joe Ralls (Cardiff) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Goal! Jamal Lowe extends Swansea's lead to 0-2.
Marlon Pack is on a sub for Mark Harris for Cardiff.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Jamal Lowe with Wayne Routledge.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Gavin Whyte is replacing Will Vaulks for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
